game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the lost city of Eldarath.
game.description: You have been tasked with retrieving a powerful ancient scroll from the lost city of Eldarath, which is hidden deep within the jungle. The scroll holds the secrets of the ancient civilization that once thrived there and is said to grant immense power to its possessor.
game.reward: The ancient scroll, granting +10 intelligence and +5 magic resistance

task.objective: Travel to the lost city of Eldarath
task.description: Navigate through the dense jungle, avoiding deadly traps and fierce creatures. Once you reach the entrance, solve a complex puzzle for entry.
task.location: The jungle, near the ancient ruins

task.description: In the entrance hall, study the stone door's patterns and symbols to unlock it through a series of presses.
task.location: The entrance hall of the lost city

task.description: In the treasure chamber, defeat the guardian to claim the reward.
task.location: The treasure chamber of the lost city
